# Aufgabe

Berechnen Sie ein kNN-Modell mit tidymodels und zwar anhand des `penguins` Datensatzes.

Modellgleichung: `body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm, data = d_train`.



Gesucht ist R-Quadrat als Maß für die Modellgüte im *TEST-Sample*.



*Hinweise*:


- Fixieren Sie die Zufallszahlen auf den Startwert 42.
- Nutzen Sie eine v=5,r=1 CV.
- Tunen Sie nicht.
- Entfernen Sie fehlende Werte in den Variablen.
- Verzichten Sie auf weitere Schritte der Vorverarbeitung.





</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung

Setup:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_27d835b89d567e7ccd2f9d7c7e557dde'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)  # Rechenzeit messen, optional
# data(penguins, package = "palmerpenguins")
d_path <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/modeldata/penguins.csv"
d <- read_csv(d_path)
```
:::



Datensatz auf NAs prüfen:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_94138a2abc521575606fe989cba4c991'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d2 <-
  d %>% 
  drop_na() 
```
:::




Datensatz aufteilen:



::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_0c7593425e9484baac3efe6ef7f06489'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(42)
d_split <- initial_split(d2)
d_train <- training(d_split)
d_test <- testing(d_split)
```
:::



Workflow:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a8becf6a0926f805a88db69b4cdfa4eb'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rec1 <-
  recipe(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm, data = d_train) %>% 
  step_naomit(all_numeric())

knn_model <-
  nearest_neighbor(
    mode = "regression"
  ) 

wflow <-
  workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(rec1) %>%
  add_model(knn_model)

wflow
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
══ Workflow ════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
Preprocessor: Recipe
Model: nearest_neighbor()

── Preprocessor ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1 Recipe Step

• step_naomit()

── Model ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
K-Nearest Neighbor Model Specification (regression)

Computational engine: kknn 
```
:::
:::



Backen:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_64de84169a44511501df16df1e737145'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_baked <- prep(rec1) %>% bake(new_data = NULL)
d_baked %>% head()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 6 × 2
  bill_length_mm body_mass_g
           <dbl>       <dbl>
1           34.5        2900
2           52.2        3450
3           45.4        4800
4           42.1        4000
5           50          5350
6           41.5        4000
```
:::
:::



Auf NA prüfen:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_a78a010b991eaba078e13cf084fcf8aa'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(is.na(d_baked))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0
```
:::
:::




CV:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_76bf729956d6738a5b1bc1edf0c19c9f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(42)
folds <- vfold_cv(d_train, v = 5)
folds
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#  5-fold cross-validation 
# A tibble: 5 × 2
  splits           id   
  <list>           <chr>
1 <split [199/50]> Fold1
2 <split [199/50]> Fold2
3 <split [199/50]> Fold3
4 <split [199/50]> Fold4
5 <split [200/49]> Fold5
```
:::
:::




Resampling:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_d1332939085eb5820c99976edb044f85'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_resamples <-
  fit_resamples(
    wflow,
    resamples = folds
  )

d_resamples
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# Resampling results
# 5-fold cross-validation 
# A tibble: 5 × 4
  splits           id    .metrics         .notes          
  <list>           <chr> <list>           <list>          
1 <split [199/50]> Fold1 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
2 <split [199/50]> Fold2 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
3 <split [199/50]> Fold3 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
4 <split [199/50]> Fold4 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
5 <split [200/49]> Fold5 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
```
:::
:::





Last Fit:




::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_f9511002e809ed8427113eb83d19df39'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_last <- last_fit(wflow, d_split)
```
:::



Modellgüte im Test-Sample:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_a99ebd1d99cec530b9a536fddc71e852'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_last %>% collect_metrics()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 rmse    standard     654.    Preprocessor1_Model1
2 rsq     standard       0.294 Preprocessor1_Model1
```
:::
:::




R-Quadrat:



::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_11f4d8dc398658a58fb8024767039ff9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sol <- collect_metrics(fit_last)[[".estimate"]][2]
sol
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.2935091
```
:::
:::
